messages.messageBody:
Hi all

hey im new to the group and i just got done reading all the emails from the past few days.

along the point of the most famous samurai, i would be a Miyamoto Musashi fan as well, but im also a Mori Motonari fan.





Tom Hatfield

"In all forms of stratagy, it is necessary to maintain the combat stance in everyday life, and to make your everyday stance your combat stance."

-Miyamoto Musashi, The Book of Five Rings,

The Water Book

oneundeadlord@...
